name: Dying Lights
description:
This is my first Game Jam game. Use WASD to move and SPACE to interact with objects. Play as BulbBoy who has been sent to fix the lights at a strange house. Turns out its not just a house but a haunted house and it's inhabitants have a real big appetite for fruit. Use your light head to give electricity to specific objects and solve puzzles as you find your way out of the house. Very short micro/demo but I hope you enjoy it.

Attributes for extra game assets -

Special thanks to my girlfriend for helping motivate me to finally finish something. I am super new to game dev and I hope to continue to make more games in the future! Let me know in the comments what you thought of my little game.
